relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are friends who have been together for five years.
Harry is speculating that the Prince is a male character.
Hermione is researching Eileen Prince, suggesting she may be related to the main character.
Harry mentions that Hermione got the information from the library.
Hermione mentions that she will be going to the library to find more information about Eileen Prince.
